plot outline: Dheeraj (Abid Bhushan), Akarsh (Sri Chennupati), Doubt Raju (Ganesh), Chitra (Gayatri Rao), Jyothi (Rachana Maurya) are came to Bangkok for Job. By mistake All of them forcibly brought to road cleaning. They get irritated for this situation. After some time the road contractors came to know that they bought the wrong persons and they get to relieved. They all came to Guest house and staying together. They met suspicious watch man called Ekambaram in the guest house. They settled in job and enjoying life in Bangkok. Suddenly One by one getting killed.
title: Myaav
plot: The vengeance taken by a Spirit on Four boys.

Dheeraj (Abid Bhushan), Akarsh (Sri Chennupati), Doubt Raju (Ganesh), Chitra (Gayatri Rao), Jyothi (Rachana Maurya) are came to Bangkok for Job. By mistake All of them forcibly brought to road cleaning. They get irritated for this situation. After some time the road contractors came to know that they bought the wrong persons and they get to relieved. They all came to Guest house and staying together. They met suspicious watch man called Ekambaram in the guest house. They settled in job and enjoying life in Bangkok. Suddenly One by one getting killed.::Tambireddy Surendrareddy
